# Analysis of ğŸ’»â”‚developers Channel

## 1. Summary
The chat primarily revolves around 3rdEyeVisuals' work on enhancing UI capabilities in Hyperfy. They demonstrated significant progress with UI image placement and implemented native z-indexing support for better layering control. The major technical achievement was the development of UIVideo functionality that uses THREE.VideoTexture to sync video frames directly from GPU, avoiding manual canvas operations and redraw calls. This implementation enables 60FPS video playback in UI panels without performance degradation. The solution includes Yoga layout for flexbox positioning and custom shaders for rounded corners. 3rdEyeVisuals also solved a color issue by converting from sRGB to linear color space. Ash noted that while UI nodes were designed to be basic, users have been able to create complex implementations, and the engine handles larger UIs well. There was also a brief discussion about wall-hanging mechanics for a Total Wipeout style course and a question about disabling shadow casting for GLB models.

## 2. FAQ
Q: Is there code I can just add to an existing GLB model script that will tell it not to cast shadows? (asked by ğ•½ğ–”ğ–šğ–˜ğ–™ğ–†ğ–“) A: Unanswered

## 3. Help Interactions
Helper: ash | Helpee: 3rdEyeVisuals | Context: Feedback on UI implementations, noting they were designed to be basic but users are doing complex things | Resolution: Confirmation that the engine handles larger UIs well
Helper: Dhin | Helpee: 3rdEyeVisuals | Context: Wall-hanging mechanics for a Total Wipeout style course | Resolution: Dhin explained it's a work in progress needing animations for wall interactions

## 4. Action Items
Type: Technical | Description: Implement UIVideo with THREE.VideoTexture for 60FPS playback without redraw calls | Mentioned By: 3rdEyeVisuals
Type: Technical | Description: Add z-indexing support to UIView for better layering control | Mentioned By: 3rdEyeVisuals
Type: Technical | Description: Convert video color from sRGB to linear color space to fix washed out appearance | Mentioned By: 3rdEyeVisuals
Type: Technical | Description: Add animations for wall interactions (hitting wall, jumping up, hanging, etc.) | Mentioned By: Dhin
Type: Technical | Description: Investigate method to make GLB models not cast shadows | Mentioned By: ğ•½ğ–”ğ–šğ–˜ğ–™ğ–†ğ–“
Type: Technical | Description: Explore way to tell models to ignore HDR lighting and sun lighting | Mentioned By: 3rdEyeVisuals
